scripts.build:ui: rm -rf dist && cd ../phonebook && npm run build && cp -r dist ../persons-backend
scripts.build:full: npm run build:ui && rsync -av --delete --exclude 'node_modules' --exclude '.git' . ../../../01.fullstack-open-render-test/ && cd ../../../01.fullstack-open-render-test && git add . && git commit -m 'Update backend' && git push origin main
